item.title: GUI System
item.dc:creator: @bighomie112 bighomie112
item.description:
@bighomie112 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:6, topic:303744”]Come on, mu Server GUI handles All aspects of the server, through a MySQL database. and It sure as hell looks alot better than that.[/quote] Lol thats probably because I CBA to write this in anyother language than java, and if you know anything about java then you would know that java cant go anywhere over baisic, Plus I dont see you writing any real script so sorry I dont need your critism seeing as how it has nothing to do with runescape, No server is going to be coded in anything besides java if it is its not runescape, Java allows the program to be run with such small VM you couldent run it if it wasent written in java, Also this is not MU, MU is written in C++ I CBA to write a program in C++ cause java is multiplatform i dont have to write but one type of program, As for the way it looks just be happy, I cant make it look much better because the fact that im trying to make it implamental to any rs server, oh and one more thing, Not very many runescape servers run of MySQL so im not going to integrate it to that, Im adding a feature to integrate it in to MySql but I dont plan on making it use MySQL only if you would have read it all im telling you that it will be multi server based

Read full topic
